description: Situated away from the main tourist area, in a rustic building that is striking for its attractive outdoor space shaded by a wooden gazebo, this restaurant boasts an informal and relaxing atmosphere. The Mediterranean cuisine is full of character and prepared with top-quality ingredients, including a small selection of oysters.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
